Play.PlayDescription: (14:50) 9-T.Romo pass to 83-T.Glenn pushed ob at DET 8 for 54 yards (32-D.Bly). Flee-flicker; Jones pitched the ball back to Romo. The reception puts Glenn over the 1,000-yards receiving mark for the season. It's his second consecutive season with over 1,000 yards receiving and fourth in his career.
